summary: Comprehensive testing of Fractional Government Bond Investment DApp completed successfully. Both backend APIs and frontend flows are working excellently with only minor issues identified.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_issues.impact: Very minor - both status codes indicate authentication required

passed_tests: User Registration - Successfully creates account with JWT token
User Login - Authentication works with proper credentials
Bond Marketplace - All 8 bonds displayed with correct data (US, Singapore, Germany, Japan, Canada, Australia, UK, Switzerland)
Bond Purchase Flow - Modal opens, amount validation, token calculation, purchase confirmation
Portfolio Dashboard - Displays total value ($15.31), tokens (15.00), holdings count (1), yield chart
Wallet Functionality - Balance display ($100 initial), transaction history, top-up feature
Navigation - All sidebar navigation works (Dashboard, Marketplace, Wallet, Education)
Logout - Successfully logs out and redirects to login page
Protected Routes - Properly redirects unauthenticated users to login
Backend APIs - 18/19 tests passed (95% success rate)
Frontend Integration - Complete user flow from registration to bond purchase works seamlessly
